name: Churches
names: St. Michael's Church,Unitarian Church,French Huguenot Church,Circular Congregational Church,Cathedral of St. John the Baptist
description: It's called the "Holy City" for a reason! Experience the beautiful architecture and rich history of the many churches of Charleston.

name: Historic Houses
names: Nathaniel Russell House,Rainbow Row,Edmondston-Alston House,Porcher-Simonds House,St. Michael's Church
description: Since its initial settlement in 1663, Charleston has been the backdrop for and home to many important historical events and figures. Explore the scenic homes and neighborhoods that are vital to understanding Charleston's rich history.

description: Charleston is home to some of the most haunted places in the United States. Gird your loins and see for yourself if the ghosts are real. If you dare.
